explains: n. 怀疑；无信用；名声的败坏

sentences.en: His political adversaries would like to discredit him.
sentences.cn: 他的政敌想破坏他的声誉。

sentences.en: Agents provocateurs may seek to discredit the opposition.
sentences.cn: 卧底可能会设法败坏反对派的名誉。

sentences.en: They spread disinformation in order to discredit politicians.
sentences.cn: 他们为破坏政治家们的名声故意散布假信息。
